titleStmt.title: SII 12.158: original edition by V. Venkatasubba Ayyar
No. 158. (A.R. No. 496 of 1921). TIRUVEṆṆAINALLŪR, TIRUKKOYILUR TALUK, SOUTH ARCOT DISTRICT. ON THE EAST AND NORTH WALLS OF THE MAṆḌAPA IN FRONT OF THE CENTRAL SHRINE IN THE VAIKUṆṬHA-PERUMĀḶ TEMPLE.

summary.p: This inscription takes stock of the cows and sheep presented by several persons for supplying ghee and milk to the temple of Vaikuṇṭhatt-Emberumāṉ at Tiruveṇṇainallūr, from the 6th year of the chief. Of five such gifts noticed here, one was made during the time of the chief's father, i.e., Aḻagiyaśīyaṉ Kōpperuñjiṅgadēva, three in his 6th year and the other in his 9th year.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . sakalabhu vaṉaccakra vattikaḷ Avaṉiāḷappiṟanta śrī kopperuñciṅkatevaṟku yāṇṭu Āṟāvatu tiruveṇṇainallūr śrī vaikuntatte
mperumāṉukku neyamu(t)tukku kayiṟūrppaṭṭilirukkum Eḻicaimokakkoṉ vaṇṭuvaraip perumāḷeṉ Ikkoyil curapimaṉṟāṭi Upakāri pakkal viṭṭa pacu 4m
cela pāl Amutukku muvāyirakkoṉ peruṅkaṉ Uḷḷiṭṭār pakkal viṭṭa pacu 4m Ākap pacu 8kkum Arumoḻitevaṉṉāḻiyāl māsa ttu nāḻi neyyum
nāḷoṉṟukku nāḻippālum candrāditya varai Aḷakkakkaṭavarkaḷāka viṭṭeṉ vaṇṭuvaraiṭ perumāḷeṉ . Innāḷil Ivvemperumāṉukku neyyamutukku Ikkoyi
l curapimaṉṟāṭi Aracakkoṉ pakkal kayiṟūrpaṭṭilirukkum maṉṟāṭi Eccilāṉ viṭṭa Āṭu 6Āṭu Āṟukku mātattu Arumoḻitevaṉṉāḻiyāl ney Uriyum candrāditya
varai celvatāka viṭṭeṉ . Innāḷil Ivvemperumāṉukku neyyamutukku ciṟṟerippaṭ ṭilirukkum Amutavallakkoṉ Ikkoyil curapimaṉṟāṭi Oruppaṉai ciṟa
ntāṉ pakkal viṭṭa Āṭu 10 2 Āṭu paṉṉiraṇṭukku mātattu Arumoḻitevaṉṉāḻiyāl ney nāḻi candrāditya varai Aḷakkakkaṭavatākavum . Itaṉmel Itte
varkku 6Āvatu nellikkutir Āṇṭavaṉcāṉi Ivvemperumāṉukkuc cantiviḷakkuk kālukku Ikkoyil curapimaṉṟāṭi tittāṉkoṉ pakkal
Ikkoyil curapimaṉṟāṭi mallikkoṉ makaṉ peruṅkaṉ cantiviḷakkuk kālukku viṭṭa pacu 1m Ākappacu 2kkum mātattu Arumoḻitevaṉnā
varai Aḷakkakkaṭavaṉākavum . Itaṉmel Aḻakiyaciyaṉ kopperuñciṅkatevar nāḷil Ivvemperumāṉukku
viḷakku 1kku maṉṟāṭi maruntakkoṉ makaṉ varantaruvāṉuḷḷiṭ ṭār pakkal mātattu Arumoḻitevaṉnāḻiyāle nāḻi ney candrāditya varai Aḷakkakkaṭava tāka viṭṭa pacu 4Iṉṉāḷil Ivvemperumāṉukku Ivvūr pāṟkuḷattu sāvitri ciṅkapperu māḷ vaitta sandhi t tiruviḷakku 1kku Ikkoyil curapimaṉṟāṭi tiruvāykkula
ṉuḷḷiṭṭār pakkal viṭṭa pacu 4kku Arumoḻitevaṉṉāḻiyāl candrāditya varai mātattu nāḻi ney Aḷakkakkaṭavarkaḷākavum.
Ends of lines 8 to 10 and the beginnings of lines 11 and 12 are built in.
Lines 11 and 12 are found on the north wall.
Digital edition of SII 12.158 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
